attributes.action: A second vote on how to leave the EU. i.e. No Deal Brexit or the PMs Brexit
attributes.additional_details: I feel that the only option is to put how we leave back to the British public and not rely on just 600+ MPs to carry on embarrassing this great country.
attributes.background: We had a referendum, a peoples vote, in 2016 and the result was to leave. Since then Parliament has turned it all into a disgraceful mess.
